ntnu.stud.valens.contentprovider.calculations

Class ManipulatorHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • ntnu.stud.valens.contentprovider.calculations.ManipulatorHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class ManipulatorHelper
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class handles most of the work in deriving new data from data that already exists in the content provider. In particular, it derives true steps based on the most reliable step detector, and calculates gait parameters (speed and variability).
    Author:
    Elias

    • Method Detail

      • run

        public void run()
        The calculation method handles the computation of gait parameters and finds the true steps. Fetches the data for the last 24 hours from the content provider. After calculation, it stores the information back into the proper tables in the content provider. This functions first finds groups of steps, and only if the step group is longer than a certain threshold it uses it to calculate gait speed and variability. Will only calculate if no calculation has occurred in the same day, to avoid steps being counted multiple times.
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        Parameters:
        context - - Any context object. Required for the ContentProviderHelper, because Android for some reason requires a context to be able to get access to content providers.
